Reviews.Title: Over priced.
Reviews.Author: Amazon Customer
Reviews.Content: For the same amount of money I've gotten much higher specs on a laptop and I would question why I would pay this much for significantly less.

ProductInfo.Features:
4th Generation Intel Core i7-4700MQ processor (6MB Cache, up to 3.4GHz w Intel Turbo Boost), Windows 7 Home Premium 64-bit
16GB Dual Channel DDR3 at 1600MHz, 750GB 7200RPM SATA 6Gb/s Hard Drive
Display: 17.3" WLED HD+ (1920 x 1080) Anti-Glare Display, NVIDIA® GeForce® GTX 765M with 2GB GDDR5
Killer NIC 1202 802.11n WiFi and Bluetooth 4.0, 9-in-1 Media Card Reader and USB 3.0
Slot-Loading 8x SuperMulti Drive (DVD/R/RW), Anodized Aluminum, Primary 6-cell 69W/HR Battery
ProductInfo.Name: Alienware 17 17-Inch Gaming Laptop, 4th Gen Intel Core i7-4700MQ UP to 3.4GHz, 16GB Memory, 750GB HDD, 2GB NVIDIA GTX 765 Graphics, Windows 7 Home Premium
